description.en:
The Japanese archipelago is in danger! The chosen boy and his army of monsters are on the move!

Tokyo is in danger of being destroyed by a super-sized yokai beast! When a young boy named Kei Watanabe, a descendant of a legendary Yokai hunter, is visited by an array of Japanese Yokai, he finds himself in the middle of the action! The latest comic in the hit Yokai movie series!
